title: TheMarketWarriors
author: TheMarketWarriors
content: Hello to everybody . I came again here to post about my project . We are still under developement but I got a big news for you . Long Story short my project is around BTC and its a platform like Amazon with Crypto Pay only . But kind of bigger than the Amazon ideea . We want to create a platform for people to use crypto *specialy BTC* for the same reasons that they use fiat money . Here you will can buy with crypto anything like from houses to cars , services and goods in general . * Now comes the important part . I am struggling for some time to reach out some influential people in this area . I kinda reach out to Elon Musk (no cap ) I have also the proof with all of our convo but I don't how to put pictures here , I might find out later . But for Everybody who is intrested in our project you can find me on tg at @themarketwarriors . I can send everybody the convo for proof no worries . I hope you can help me make this project .

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: I can get you investors at a fee. Hit me up on Telegram: @ElevatedWarrior

comments.author: digaran

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What is special about your idea or what makes it special because, as far as I know, there are many de/central markets that provide such services, for example but not limited to bitify.com/Building a market from scratch is an expensive process, so why not try to find a way to use bitcoin on sites that currently not allow it.Quote from: digaran on March 18, 2023, 04:06:33 AMSo you had a conversation with Elon Musk? What are you doing here then? You could both bring down amazon together, you don't need us here.ðŸ˜‰This part that he mentioned is Red flag, enough for any investor to avoid talking to him.
